placeholderText.name: Input your name, please.
placeholderText.request: Please write your request. (up to 200 characters)

errorText.name: Please write only in English or Korean.
errorText.email: Please fill in the correct email form.
errorText.mobileNumber: Number is incorrect. Please fill in the format 000-0000-0000.
errorText.verification: An error occurred during authentication. Please try again in a few minutes.

agreement.numberOfPeople: Number of people: Exceeding the reserved number of people and visitors are not allowed to enter the room. In case of violation, move out without refund
agreement.nonSmokingInformation: Non-smoking information: Absolutely no smoking, including e-cigarettes, in all areas of the accommodation. In case of violation, immediate eviction without refund and cleaning fee charged
agreement.reimbursementInformation: Reimbursement Information: Compensation fees are charged in case of property damage or contamination of bedding in the accommodation.
agreement.cookingRegulations: Cooking regulation: This is an accommodation where cooking with open fire is not allowed, and eating smelly food (meat, fish, seafood, etc.) is prohibited
agreement.petRegulations: Pet regulation : Pets are not allowed.
agreement.refundPolicy: Refund Policy: I agree to the refund policy provided.
agreement.personalInformation: Consent to collection and use of personal information (required)

personalInfoContents.collectionItems: 1. Collection items: [Required] Name, contact information, e-mail address, personnel information
personalInfoContents.purposeOfCollection: 2. Purpose of collection and use: Smooth transaction between business members and reservation users, customer consultation, complaint handling, record preservation for dispute resolution, stay portfolio membership and promotion, event information
personalInfoContents.retentionPeriod: 3. Retention period: Until the purpose of using personal information such as membership withdrawal is achieved. However, if storage is required for a certain period of time in accordance with relevant laws such as the Commercial Act and the ‘Act on Consumer Protection in Electronic Commerce, etc.’, it is stored for that period.
personalInfoContents.rightToRefuse: 4. Notice on the right to refuse consent: The information subject has the right to refuse consent to the collection and use of personal information, but in this case, product and service reservations may be restricted.

agreement.alarmAgreement: Agree to notification of benefits such as coupons and events (optional)

alarmAgreementContents.subscribe: Subscribe to Hanok Stay Yeo-yeo's benefits, promotions, and event news

refundPolicyInformationContents.before10days: 10 days ago: 100% refund of the payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before9days: 9 days ago: 90% refund of payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before8days: 8 days ago: 80% refund of payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before7days: 7 days ago: 70% refund of payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before6days: 6 days ago: 60% refund of payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before5days: 5 days ago: 50% refund of payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before4days: 4 days ago: 40% refund of payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before3days: 3 days ago: 30% refund of payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before2days: 2 days ago: 20% refund of payment amount
refundPolicyInformationContents.before1days: 1 days ago: 10% refund of payment amount

check.title: Reservation confirmation / Cancellation information
check.guideMessage1: Details of reservation products can be checked by clicking the Confirm Reservation button of each product.
check.guideMessage2: To cancel a reservation, click the Cancel button after clicking Confirm Reservation for each product, and a refund will be requested automatically.

placeholderText.reservationNumber: Please enter the 13 digit reservation number.

errorText.mobileNumber: Number is incorrect. Please fill in the format 000-0000-0000.
errorText.reservationNumber: Please enter the 13-digit reservation number sent by text message.

success.guideMessage1: Your reservation has been successfully completed.
success.guideMessage2: For detailed reservation information, click the 'Confirm Reservation' button to check.

detail.refundGuideMessage2: , you will receive a full refund. After that, the refund amount will be determined according to the time of cancellation.
